reviews: This place is beautiful and the best experience I've had. The staff and so friendly and helpful. They make you feel amongst friends not strangers. The food at the buffet is really good. You here buffet and you don't think it'll be that great but it was really great with just enough options. The food in the Restaurants are a little limited and threw isn't much air conditioner there, but again the staff is great. Everything was clean and convenient. Alejandro and Jeu were just amazing. Making friends amongst strangers with them meant the world. The rooms are just stunning. One word to the wise do not leave your balcony door open or your room will immediately become a slip 'n slide even a small cracked door. Oversll for me 10/10

This was our first time out of the Country and our first time at all inclusive adult resort.  Overall If I was rating out of a 10 I would give this 9/10.  We had a big party of friends, so the only downfall it was harder to get us in the restaurants early enough to enjoy the experince- We felt rushed by the staff due to the time of 2 nights.  The last night at Tahini was the absolute best customer service, they were opening, friendly and took their time with our party.  I really appreciated that.  Vista Restaurant was another restaurant that was amazing for breakfast and lunch! Our room was so nice! Clean, the cleaning staff were amazing! We ended up getting the swim out, if you are looking for more privacy do  not get the swim out room.  We had a random neighbor come out,

A beautiful resort, staff are super nice. We were at the serenity and had an amazing experience.   The Mexican Buffet is outstanding! Some of the restaurants are also good, we liked the steak house and the Asian, the rest of the restaurants are average.   Drinks are OK, I kept drinking Mezcal and spicy Margarita. Michel** and Anotion's coctails are nice. But the guy at Mixology Bar (Main building) I think his name is Miguel he is the best!   We spent most or our time at the main pool just because of the activities. Pepe is a great fun, and there was another (petite) lady forgot her name but they had the best energy with fun activities.  If you have the time go to visit Isla Moujeres it's fun. I wouldn't take the tours from the hotel, I think online you can find much cheaper

The resort was fantastic! Our concierge Angel was awesome and so very helpful! The multiple restaurant options on site were all delicious. All of the staff were courteous and very helpful. We stayed in a swim out ocean view room...and it did not disappoint.  Our favorite restaurant was Agua Bendita! We have recommended this resort to all of our friends and family. This was our 2nd stay at this resort.

The service standard and quality of Haven was top notch; second to none. It wasn’t as busy as other hotels which we loved. It was calm, serene but with good activity at night which wasn’t too noisy. My wife and I got the swim out suite and we loved every bit of it. I highly, highly recommend this hotel if you’re looking for a place to relax in Cancun. It’s also only 15-20 minutes away from the airport which was great

There were 14 of us and the butler did a great job getting us dinner reservations together. Rooms were clean and staff were very nice. Room service was fairly quick. The macrame class was really fun and interactive. They have a catamaran, kayak, and paddle board service; it costs $3 for unlimited use.

Haven Riveria Cancun is for the couple that is looking to just relax, soak up the sun, and drink. Food is decent, the drinks are good. The staff goes out of their way to help you. Rooms are comfortable. Entertainment at night is comparable to a cruise ship shows, they were good. Definitely, it is not a singles party resort, it’s for couples.

Loved the whole resort was laid out nice. The food was good. Even the beach was nice. The pools was where everything was happening during the day. Limes bar at night was the bar to be at. Here were shows every night at moons.

Best spot for adults to relax and have a good time. Restaurants were great. Pools were awesome. Spa was amazing. Drinks were good. Try a Miami vice it's so good and their strawberry margaritas with tajin on the rim. I will also post a blog on YouTube for you to see my experience there.

This was my first trip to Cancun and the experience was incredible to say the least! I came with a friend to celebrate my birthday and stayed a week. Our bellman Alberto started the trip off with many jokes and set the tone for a great week. The service, Brandon gave us with laughter at the bar a tour of the serenity club, treating us to a special birthday dinner and giving tips on where to go in town, made this birthday one I will never forget. Michel and Raul joked and laughed with us at the poolside bars every day. Angie walked our drinks to the tiki hut on the beach front, and anticipated our needs for refills without us having to track her down or place an order with her. I must say having our first drink of the day pop up out of no where with no order truly have me the

This place is top notch! The ultimate place to relax and escape. Homberto was the best! Anything and everything we needed he was all over and never disappointed. Santos went above and beyond also! Pay attention to the dress codes because some restaurants have them and they are enforced. Food was amazing. Drinks even better! Start your day off with a mango daiquiri and go to the ice berg from then! Rooms were clean and comfortable. We had a top floor balcony overlooking the ocean. Couldn’t have been any better! We will for sure be back! Ay Miguel!!!

This was our third all-inclusive experience in Mexico, the second in Cancun specifically. We did not upgrade to the Serenity Club.  **What you need to know: there are dress codes to the different restaurants. Look at the hotel website for specific requirements.** Pros: This was a very tropical and lovely property. It is well maintained and the staff is friendly and helpful. I particularly appreciated that upon arrival, we were given our arm bands/room keys (cool idea), and allowed to go get lunch before we had access to our rooms at 3pm. The rooms were clean and kept well-stocked.  We never had trouble getting into the restaurants for dinner, even without reservations (it is first-come-first served in most).  I did appreciate the dress codes for dinners, as it promoted the right

The Haven Riviera was an amazing place to stay.  Hotel overall was clean and inviting and the staff was so nice. We spent most of our vacation around the main pool and it was kept in excellent condition (good job to Diego the pool man).  The restaurants were great and there was never a short supply of food and drinks! We liked our overall experience and would recommend this hotel to anyone interested in an adults only location!

This is an amazing hotel.staff couldnt do enough. Bar staff so very friendly. I have stayed in cancun on a few occasions and this hotel by far outweighs them all. Hotel should be very proud of their staff.

The resort is top notch! We got the swim out suite and it was fabulous to have ours own piece of Haven!  The food was amazing especially Olios,the service was out of this world. Cesar was our favourite server to see his smiling face every morning at the buffet.

The food was amazing at the Agua bendita. Our server Eduardo was top notch and went out of his way to make our last evening special. The chef prepared a special delicious appetizer and main course for us.

Pepe was a very good entertainer and kept the crowds engaged during all of the events that he hosted!  Very good resort Staff was amazing and very attentive. Water activities was nice and free  No pressure from anyone to buy anything

The service staff at Haven Riviera are some of the best I have ever encountered. The food and drinks were better than expected. I strongly discourage booking an excursion with Aquaworld at the resort. Our excursion was overbooked and poorly organized. There were not many activities to do at the resort, but we were content with relaxing all day in the pool by the swim up bar.

On the first night at the hotel, also being the first night of our honeymoon, I slipped on in our swim out suite due to a wet floor and a lack of signage, towels, or mats. The back of my head hit the track of the sliding glass door and I have to be taken to the hospital where I received 10 stitches. The night manager “Obed”, was less than friendly or helpful and very dismissive, as he would only communicate with my husband. In his “communication”, he told us that it was our fault that this happened and was implied to put a mat down, even though none were provided. He also told us that this has never happened before, despite us meeting many other people at the resort that this has happened too during their first days as well. We requested to see the “safety contract” that was had

The resort was exactly what we were looking for! We stayed in a Serenity Romance Swim Out OceanFront suite. Our butler, Jonathon and our favorite server, Rogelio took great care of us! So did our housekeeper, Mary! The food was outstanding!

The resort was immaculate, the staff was so helpful and attentive. The activities during the day and in the evening were fun. The pools were so beautiful and clean. We enjoyed the variety of restaurants and all of the food was great! We will definitely be back!

We had a great time made better by some amazing people there. Yami went above and beyond to make the trip fun and memorable! Ronald was an outstanding pool waiter too! Our room was sparkling clean and the staff truly is spectacular. We would definitely visit again!

Amazing staff and so much fun and yommy was so awesome love her! Gym was perfect had amazing workouts and food was incredibly delicious met some really cool people and the rooms were absolutely beautiful

Haven Riviera was the perfect stay. Balanced with a comfortable amount excursions it made for an absolutely perfect honeymoon. The staff is so amazingly kind and genuinely interested in your happiness. Especially Yammi and the entertainment team. The resort has plenty of food options (I personally recommend Agua Bendita) and is super walkable, you will never be exhausted before you reach your destination. The room service and maid staff are very fast and I cant recall a day in which our room wasnt serviced with exceptional timeliness while we were out and about. The location is convenient for the airport commute, and the beach has many available cabana and lounging options. Drinks are quick and generally of high quality. Legitimately the only negative thing I can say (which

Haven Rivera was the perfect spot to honeymoon! Our room was amazing and the ocean view was perfect. Always cleaned and well taken care of and stocked. Food was pretty great all around. Some of the restaurants being better than others. The Asian and Mexican steakhouses by far the best! The entertainment team always had activities going on, from water volleyball and water workouts to different evening activities. Our favorites were bingo and trivia with Yammi!! We enjoyed the shows in the evenings. The spa is a 10/10 on its own. Best massage of my life! Over all a great stay with few minor and insignificant complaints (like room service breakfast waking me up 15 min early than planned)

Resort was very private,  clean friendly staff. Food was good. Very relaxing place , we have private pool and was great for couple. Great pool for day time  with music, night time fun also. We can get drink anytime, anywere in resort  Great vacation destination.

Highly recommend this resort! We had a great time. The resort was absolutely beautiful, very clean, and well run. Check in and check out were seamless. We had our own butler, Gaby, who was extremely attentive and efficient. The staff was so kind and welcoming and constantly went out of their way to serve you. Things were continuously being cleaned and turned over. There was a lot to do within the resort itself. Entertainment was great, though quite loud in the club. The spa was beautiful. Gym was small but well stocked and functional. The room was very nice with a spacious bathroom. Housekeeping did an amazing job. The food was good though a little bland. The Mediterranean restaurant, Olios, was the best. Drinks tasted great but didn’t seem to have much alcohol in them. My only

Had a good time here. The property was quite nice. Food was truly just mediocre. Nothing really wowed us but most food was good. Reservations only needed for the hibachi  table and for Olios. They had a very small entertainment team but not enough activities for our liking. We were in building 6 which was a partial ocean view. It was a great location. Close to main pool and main building where restaurants are located. Had room 6212. The sliding door to the toilet didnt stay closed which was annoying and water ran all onto the bathroom floor when we used the shower. Otherwise the room was comfortable and well stocked with all the necessities, including hair products, toothbrushes and toothpaste, lighted magnified makeup mirror, hairdryer, clothes steamer, safe, walk in closet,

The property is very nice and clean. House keeping did a great job during our stay. The bar service around the pool was average at best. It was hard to get a drink unless you walked to the bar.  We also had an issue at check in and the front desk staff was a bit rude and reluctant to help at first.

This was our third year traveling to Mexico. Haven Riviera completely blew our expectations out of the water. Everything was seamless, thanks to our incredible butler, Adrian. The resort grounds and rooms were stunning, the food was spectacular, the service was top notch. If you’re looking for somewhere to go and be treated like royalty, THIS IS IT! We can’t wait to get back to this beautiful slice of paradise. We will recommend to everyone we know!

This was our second time at this resort, and we have decided to come here every year for her anniversary! The Butler that we had Eduardo was amazing the concierge Sahal at the serenity pool just made sure we had whatever we needed. The food was amazing as usual we were able to Check out the newly built area, buildings seven and eight, and we just had a marvelous time. We can’t wait to go back and I want to go back right now!

This resort always delivers a 10/10 experience all around! This is our second time staying with Haven Riviera Cancun and we thoroughly enjoyed every minute of our experience! We love the service and friendliness of the staff, the food, quality of amenities, and the attention to detail to everything. The staff there thoroughly take care of us and make us feel safe and welcomed. I highly recommend!!!!

Wow!  An amazing resort.  The pool service was the best!  Rojelio was our waiter and he catered to all our needs!  I read lots of reviews and wanted to know these things —room service was 24 hours a day.  You have a mini bar that is stocked 1 time a day. The pool outside your room is beautiful.  (Garden view is more private than ocean or partial ocean view.) The beach was not pretty but we did a tour to Isla Mujerles which is breathtaking.  We were able to walk up to every restaurant except Olios and able to eat.  The reservations were full so make reservations the minute you arrive at the hotel. We did not do hibatchi for the same reason of no reservations,but we were able to eat  at the Asian place.  The food was good at the Asian place.  Overall it was a great trip for all !

Haven riviera Cancún was just what my husband and I needed. It was very peaceful and we didn’t feel rushed on this vacation. The staff were great our favorite was Cesar Dafne from the flavors restaurant. Very attentive, knew our names and just made us feel like family.

During our recent beach resort visit, the exceptional service provided by Edith truly stood out. Her warm welcome and extensive knowledge made us feel valued. Edith effortlessly guided us through amenities and activities, enhancing our experience. Her attention to detail, valuable suggestions, and unwavering commitment to perfection left a lasting impression. Edith's passion for customer service was evident in every interaction, making us feel cared for and valued. Her personalized approach and dedication to delivering a luxurious experience exceeded expectations. While Marilou also made a significant impact, it was Edith's exceptional service that left an indelible mark. We are immensely grateful for Edith's care and wholeheartedly recommend her for a remarkable vacation

Everything on the hotel was great! The service was excellent, there is a Girl name Marilu at the main pool!!! She is over the top! Never give us the chance to need something! Everybody very friendly. Food is Great! Cleanliness great!

Yami is the best! Everyone at the resort was awesome but she was our favorite employee. She was super friendly and the pool was also awesome. When I cut my head, she helped me out and made sure I was taken care of by the medic.

Really good food, hotel, amazing atmosphere, and amazing staff!! Highly recommend! Yami made sure the stay was extremely fun and lively! They have a lot of activities going on throughout the day from cooking classes to yoga to water blackjack! So many different activities!!

Friendly staff, especially Yami! She was a blast and great at keeping our group entertained.  Always laughing and smiling, we loved when she was around. Food was great, rooms were beautiful and loved our stay.

We have stayed at countless resorts and The Haven had it all! We did not leave the resort!  The food was above and beyond!  The food was amazing!  The resort offered everything. For the the first time we did not feel like they were herding cattle by closing the pools and bars!  What a perfect vacation!  Thanks the Angel our butler for everything!  My room was too hot and he immediately took care of it. He made sure we had dinner reservations when needed and was always reachable.

The resort was beautiful and all the activities were great! Yommy made our trip so fun!! The room was very nice and the staff was always super attentive. We didn’t want to leave! Would definitely go to this resort again.

Had so much fun! Especially enjoyed hanging out with Yommy at the pool and doing aqua aerobics! She made an effort to get to know our little group and interacted with us everyday of our trip! It made pool time so enjoyable!

This is our 3rd visit to Haven and it was an amazing experience, as always. We like to take advantage of the serenity package and stayed in a beautiful ocean view room in building 5.   Angel, our butler and truly now our friend after so many visits, is the best! He went above and beyond to make our vacation special.  He had the room decorated for my birthday, birthday decor at dinner and even reserved us a special private table at the steakhouse for our last dinner, where we had amazing service from the manager, Luis and his team.   Angie, Hugo, Sahel, Raul and Antonio…to name just a few, provided amazing service while we enjoyed drinks and relaxation at their many beautiful pools.  Thank you for everything, Haven! We will be back!

What an amazing experience this was! Resort is gorgeous, staff is phenomenal! Very clean. Highly recommend! We will definitely use this resort again when we come back! Hands down, the best place in town!!

This hotel is a disappointment It ruined the whole Cancun experience Starting from the attitude during check in from Sandra and Yvonne They started scaring us that we should use the safe box as the rooms were bot safe !!! What a way to start our stay with a scare ! They didn’t provide basic amenities like slippers Room service never answer until after the hundredth time !! Door locks were not working properly !! We press the DND button and they still ring the bell !! The mattresses need change as they are over used ! Food is tasteless every where in the hotel ! Neighbors are very noisy !! Yohemy in the mochaccino was not welcoming at all and has a bad attitude They don’t even clean the beach from the seaweed like other hotels Never Again !!! The only positive thing is that we

We stayed here for a week this summer (2023). It was a wonderful experience. The staff was very attentive, friendly, and helpful. We suggest paying the extra expense of reserving at the Serenity Club level.

Was utterly disappointed with management and customer service in response to our Serenity Club swim up suite being INFESTED with mosquitoes that feasted on us as we slept during our 4-night stay June 14th 2023. For the premium we paid for these accommodations it was unacceptable; despite respectfully advising our butler of the issue, then escalating to the jr manager (Valentia) then sr manager (Ana), their dismal response was offensive. Ruined an otherwise peaceful and enjoyable experience. Will not be returning  nor recommending this resort to my professional nor personal network; compared to previous resort stays in the Cancun area (Breathless) this property lacks adequate customer service and management response skills- totally missing the mark completely! We did not feel

Wife took me here for bday. Loved that it wasn’t crowded and extremely loud.food options were great and pools very spacious. Amazing staff. They were extremely attentive and friendly. Never felt any pressure.

Excellent service and great room experience especially Roxana room service and Javier minibaar service..would definitely be back.Food and grounds were spectacular. Pools clean and beautiful. Drinks were always available and really friendly bartenders. Overall a wonderful experience!

We absolutely loved our experience! We spent most of our day by the pool (Elias, Alfredo and Paco were incredible pool staff. Lots of fun activities and made personal connections with the guests). ‘Pool concierge’ was proactive and readily available, for all of our needs. We didn’t even have to carry towels to our seats! We chose not to do the Serenity Club level, but genuinely did not feel a difference in the level of service and attention we received. I purchased a float from the gift shop and they immediately filled it with air for me out at the pool. It’s a ‘smaller’ resort which led to an exclusive, private feel. This was our first all inclusive, but I’ve been on several cruises- the mad dash for saved seats at the pools didn’t happen here! My husband and I enjoyed seat

Had our anniversary dinner at Agua Benedito and Gilberto was our server and he was absolutely AMAZING! He was very attentive and made sure we had a great experience. Such a fun time and fantastic food!

The entire resort is beautiful, a lot of options for food but I highly recommend the Mexican Steakhouse. Gilberto was a great server and really made the area enjoyable and the manager Luis was very friendly too. But the food at the steakhouse was delicious. We almost tried one of everything and did not disappoint. We will be returning to this restaurant multiple times during our stay. Also if you like espresso the carijillo drink was delicious

Stayed for 2 weeks on a couples break for our anniversary and birthday, our best holiday to date couldn’t recommend enough.   Pepe was our goto main man around the resort, couldn’t do enough for us throughout our whole stay. Top guy. We will definitely be back.

The resort was excellent, but Javier and Hugo Miguel were exceptional. Javier provided perfect room and mini bar service, and Hugo Miguel made the best drinks. 10/10 would recommend. If you see him at Haven, make sure you get service with him!

We had a great time with Eduardo. He took a very good care of us and suggested us everything that was great on the menu he kept on bringing us drinks, and the drinks tasted delicious and we can’t wait to come here again. His service was impeccable and I hope all you guys give him a good raise.

A relaxation destination! If you are looking to unplug, unwind, and read a book in peaceful serenity then Haven Riviera Cancun is for you. The staff is friendly, the resort is clean, the spa services are fabulous and the views are amazing. I would highly recommend to others.

This resort is absolutely wonderful! The grounds and resort in general are very well maintained and extremely clean. The staff are by far the best I've ever encountered. They truly go above and beyond to make guests happy. The food was wonderful, many options to choose from. The bars were fantastic with fantastic staff! Pools were immaculate. We had the Serenity package and it was a great experience! Greeted right away with friendly staff and a wonderful butler who took great care of us. Definitely recommend this resort for anyone looking to relax! Don't forget to book the spa services! Absolutely wonderful!

Thank you Haven resort for the pampering and relaxing family vacation! We highly recommend the Serenity upgrade for extra perks and access to butler services. Special shout out to Nacho, our Butler who made this one of the BEST trip we’ve had. The moment we arrived to check-in we were served welcome drinks followed by a personalized tour of the facility-what an amazing touch. We were able to secure dinner reservations at four restaurants hassle free all thanks to Nacho. Food was great!! we recommend Satsu, Olios and Tahani 10/10. We celebrated our father’s birthday with a decorated room and a phenomenal dinner at Olios arranged by Nacho! All staff members were extremely friendly and welcoming. Can’t wait to be back!

Today is the 4th day of our stay, and my wife and I are thoroughly enjoying every moment. The excellent 'Butler' service has been a fantastic idea, allowing us to simply text our requests instead of reaching out to the front desk. Eduardo, our attentive and fabulous Butler, has been instrumental in arranging all the events for us. Thanks to Jeu, we never had to worry about our pool seats as he saved them for us. Marilu has been very helpful, bringing us everything we need at the poolside. And Yami has been a lot of fun, leading exciting exercises and organizing volleyball games by the pool. We are having an amazing stay! Thank you all!

All the activities were super fun. Yami was awesome leading the water aerobics, water volleyball, and so much more! The pools were great and the drinks were flowing. Food was good and facilities were clean.  10/10 would recommend.

This is a wonderful hotel with great staff/service, one of the nicest hotel I've stayed. Sandra at the front desk went above and beyond to accommodate us, we had a great time here, great drinks by the pool made by Eli. This hotel its close to/from airport but the beach its not clean due to location, I only wish they had a barrier to help with the sargassum seaweed from reaching the shore.

Jesus Chi was an amazing waiter at the Agua Benita. He made sure we had everything we needed and helped make suggestions. He greeted us wish hospitality drinks. The resort is amazing and the employees like Jesus make it an amazing place!! Will be back soon!!!

One word Awesome. It was my first all inclusive expereince and they just won my heart. Not a single miss in giving excellent service, from room service to restaurant service. I didnt book Serenity club room but facilit for Junior Suite is also best. We booked swim out room and that was the best decision made. Thank you to Haven Riviera, they truly made my expereince memorable. Keep up the good work!!! I am visiting again for sure.

Enjoyed a relaxing vacation at this beautiful resort. Every staff member that we encountered were top notch, everyone was polite and eager to help. Bar service was exceptional, we never had to wait on a drink. All food, including 24 hr room service was delicious. House keeping checked rooms twice per day, the room was very clean and stocked appropriately. We will definitely be back!

This review is more like a 3.5. The hotel, staff, pool, everything was so great... honestly so good (I loved our room, the jucuzzi tub on the balcony, etc). But the food was VERY hit or miss. So, for being an all-inclusive, it knocked off some points for me. Room service, breakfast, and lunch often had some good items, some really bad items, but most were edible just not good. Dinner was better, but we only had opportunity to go to two places: Olios (delicious) and the Asian restaurant (if you like good sushi, probably not the place to go - fish is subpar, warm, etc. - it's apparently more popular for the teppanyaki - which we didn't do - some items were better than others here). Drinks were inconsistent. They got better when the crowds of the weekend were gone.

Great service, and wonderful food. The whole staff is very friendly. If you're interested in a relaxing vacation, chill at the circle pool and Alberto will take great care of you. Also stop by the spa and enjoy the hydrotherapy experience, it's only $60, and worth every penny. Only down side was the beach, but we were hear during seaweed season, so not the hotels fault.

This resort looked like a movie set it was so beautiful! We had a heavenly stay and felt like royalty. The restaurants were excellent, the bartenders kept the drinks flowing and the nightclub put on fun shows (though the nightclub was a little too warm for our Midwestern preferences.)  The resort was a little too far from Cancun for shopping and clubs but for a relaxing/luxurious vacation, this is the place!

This place was amazing. The swim up pool is the best . Food was very good we ate at all the different restaurants they were all good . And a must for me is a comfortable bed the bed was very comfortable . The worker’s there are very friendly. Overall we had a great time .

Great service! Especially from Hugo, Ivan and Sahel. They were so accommodating with all our needs which was greatly appreciated. Analy did an excellent job of keeping the room super neat and tidy, loved her touch of the animal towels! Overall, great stay.

The staff could not do enough for us from bar staff, to restaurant waiters, cleaners, reception, room service and activity presenters. The resort offered everything that we needed and more. Food was excellent, drinks were superb and a special shout out to Pepe who made our stay very personal and as relaxing as possible.

This place is absolutely incredible, from the food, to the staff (especially the bartenders). Hugo, the bartender at the pool bars, was great and always made our group amazing drinks! Enrique is a mixologist who was both entertaining and a master bartender. Yami had groups at the pool participating in sporting events and was both a fun  and expert Black Jack dealer!   The best restaurants were the Mexican steakhouse and Satsu (Asian cuisine). The food was incredible. You have to get governors tacos at the Mexican steakhouse - they are delicious. Everything at Satsu, from the sushi to the bowls, was awesome.   For breakfast and lunch we always ate at the buffet. We saw a few reviews on here with some complaints, but keep in mind it’s a buffet, so it caters to everyone. Every day

My wife and I had a blast!! Resort is extremely beautiful, well-organized, and very clean. There are two pools, one “party” pool and one “chill” pool, both of which are overall pretty chill - the “party” pool just has activities and a DJ. Pools and swim-up bars are outstanding, though the water could be a touch cooler. The activities are amazing. We did beach volleyball, water volleyball, blackjack, water cycling, water aerobics, and cornhole, all of which were awesome. Elias, Maui, Yami, and Pepe are the entertainment crew and were all amazing and made everyone’s experience so memorable. Restaurants were all very yummy with lots to choose from and we couldn’t ask for much more (we did not do any reservations). Night entertainment was exceptional. We loved all the shows. Casino

Amazing service from start to finish. Javier made our trip even more amazing by keeping us stocked with all the faves( nom nom nom). Make sure you are ask for my buddy by name upon arrival to make that trip more memorable!

This resort is close to perfect. It had the friendliest and most helpful staff of any resort I have visited. The grounds are beautiful, the rooms are comfortable and there is a nice variety of restaurants to choose from. There are many activities for all ages. I have nothing negative to say about this resort.

I’m on the plane home from my trip to Cancun staying at Haven. We booked through a travel agent and were on a budget due to some gals in the group not being able to afford too much. I’m a hotel snob and frequent traveler for work and pleasure. I was super skeptical that I would like the place due to how affordable it was. I was pleasantly surprised.   The rooms were amazing!  We upgraded to the serenity club and it was well worth it. The view, private pool, discount at the spa and butler were all a great touch. Edith was our butler and she was the best butler I’ve ever had. Spoke great English, super responsive and helpful.  She was like a live Alexa who was at our beck and call anytime.   The spa was the most incredible I’ve seen and I’ve been to a ton of them. Highly recommend

It's hard to read all the positive reviews as my wife and I didn't have the best time. I stayed very recently in an oceanfront swim out room in building 1. Upon arrival, everything seemed nice, but as soon as I got to my room, I knew it was going to be a rough trip. Our air conditioning didn't work, and we had to have help twice to get it to cool down. It's over 100° this time of year, and it's needed. Our butler Charly was the absolute worst. I tipped him $10 the first day just for walking us to our room. We exchanged numbers, and that's the last I saw of him. I wanted roses and champagne for my anniversary, and he didn't answer until the next day. Trying to salvage the trip we set out to eat at all the restaurants.  The food lacked flavor. Everywhere we went, it had not even

I would have given this a 5 star but there were several things that prevented that score: Housekeeping issues Restaurant charges for an all-inclusive Front desk not really helpful Overall, the hotel experience was great and a relaxing vacation.

The hotel is beautiful. But what is really impressive about this hotel is the service. All the employees we had contacted during our stay were impressive. They are genuinely care about making your stay perfect. The cleaning of the room was impeccable and with nice little touches as the flowers and the end of the day refresh to make the room ready for sleep. If you are part of the Serenity experience you’ll have your own personal butler. Gabriela was our butler and we had her in instant message and didn’t have to worry about anything, from scheduling restaurants and spa, to suggestions for the day, reminding before activities, really anything. The Ollio restaurant was  the best. There’s a dressing code and they take it seriously, so go prepared. The entertainment is very good.

Mexico Haven and Agua Bendita was truly amazing! July 2023 One of the best times that I've had in a long time on a trip period. The trip was absolutely amazing. From our butler Carlos, to the fantastic dinner that we had at Agua Bendita. Ponchito Luis Burgos and Ponchito Jesus Hernandez and staff were just absolutely amazing and capped of a wonderful evening with a dinner celebration for my birthday! The food - was absolutely amazing and Ponchito Luis and Ponchito Jesus made it a memorable experience. Carlos made the vacation worth every penny - was my first in Cancun.

Very clean and very friendly staff. The pool entertainers Maui and Pepe were always energetic and doing their best to get participation. The pool was great, clean and fun to be in.   Friendly waiters and they were always smiling.   Both of our outlets in our room, by the bed, stopped working and after talking to the front desk it never got resolved.   Food was really good and so were all the drinks. The Asian restaurant, Satsu, was by far the best.   As we were preparing to leave, the Amstar vehicle was 30 minutes late(forgot about us) so they sent us to the airport in a private vehicle. The staff were very apologetic and helpful.   The staff and personnel are very driven to make us happy. We gladly recommend this resort to all who travel here.

Beautiful resort,love it's adult only resort so I felt more relax.it needs a little more entertainment during the day especially by the main pool and the buffet breakfast and lunch to be a little warmer so it won't be cold at time to eat it

We loved the place. It was very close to airport, but the ocean was not pretty at all. Most of our time we spent by the pools. But pools were quite warm, I would even say hot. The room was big and cool. The view from our room was amazing. I have to mention food. That was very pleacent experience.

We stayed at this resort for our honeymoon in July 2023. It’s a very beautiful resort. The check in process was great. We arrived about 2 hours early and they held our bags for us while we explored and grabbed lunch. Once our room was ready we were escorted via golf cart which we were very grateful for because our room was pretty far. There is construction going at the resort due to the convention center they’re building but we were not near it so I didn’t affect us. There are some things that could use improvement though. The food is very basic and I did get food poisoning on the last day our our trip. Lighting in the room is very dim which will make it hard for those who do makeup. And the temperature in the room didn’t feel cold enough. It seems like they have the ceiling fan

our stay at Haven was exceptional.  I would strongly suggest the Serenity Club option because it provides you with a butler and ours, Jorge' was absolutely the best!!! He checked in with us daily and made us dinner reservations, found us a float and made sure the room fridge was stocked with our favorites.  It is these little touches that make vacations truly memorable.  The resort is beautiful, well manicured and the pools are the absolute best.

We just returned from our fourth trip to Haven. We love this resort. The grounds are beautiful. The resort is always clean. I’m a very picky eater and I could always find good things to eat. It seems like each trip we make there they add more varieties. the pork chops and steak at Agra banita were excellent. The staff is always willing to bend over backwards to help you. Our butler, Edith, is the best. She took care of us, even on her day off, which was totally unexpected. She works so hard and Employees like her deserve to be acknowledged .  Abraham at the Bell desk  was amazing. From when we arrived, and he delivered our bags, he never forgot our faces the entire trip and always went out of his way to say hi. Our maid, Maria, was excellent. She always greeted us every day and

It was our 20th year anniversary  We’ve chosen ocean view swim-out serenity room with daily refill of your fridge drinks  It was the best decision to choose our room  Spacious modern and the swim-out view  Very quiet part of resort with all the whistles  Our butler NACHO was the best butler you could ask for  -he took care of everything  very nice person to talk to  From start to the end he was keeping an eye on us -what’s app was very easy to use for our communications Overall the resort is the cleanest resort I’ve ever been 3 pools -relaxing round pool - main pool with entertainments and serenity club pool for another relaxation  All pools with swim-bars and all other bars snack bars  Great dinner  restaurants from  culinary Mediterranean Asian katsu or Mexican steak house

Staff was very lovely, especially Yami. She was so friendly and helpful. The food was great and also the facilities were amazing. I would definitely recommend if you are travelling alone and would like a relaxing stay.

We enjoyed everything about our stay at the Haven.  Staff was fantastic, food and drink were excellent and the accommodations were better great.  If your looking for a place to relax get a room with a swim out pool.

The swim out pool is great and bar staff are all friendly and helpful. The room annd grounds anre kept super clean annd looking great.  All around great experience. We are planning on going back every year.

Nice rooms but the ambient at the hotel its not the greatest. The restaurants, just good except for one that was excellent. Other restaurants you need to pay extra. The beach, terrible unfortunately, it doesn't looks like the Caribbean because in the water its to much sargasso and smell. I didn't even go in the water. Very sad.
